body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. play black vise
2. play howling mine
3. pass the turn What is the expected output? What do you see instead? the correct sequence should be: 
1. black vise damage (upkeep phase)
2. draw additional card (draw phase)
instead the order of events is reversed, because Howling Mine draw is triggered in the upkeep phase What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.38, win 7 home (64x) If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
